title: Retrieve the Top Seller status criteria

returns.description: <TopSellerCriteria> Criteria that needs to be met to become a Top Seller

fields.name: SalesCount
fields.description: The number of sales needed to qualify for Top Seller status.

fields.name: SalesValue
fields.description: The total value of sales in dollars needed to qualify for Top Seller status.

fields.name: SellThroughRate
fields.description: The sell-through rate in percent needed to qualify for Top Seller status.

fields.name: FeedbackRating
fields.description: The feedback rating needed to qualify for Top Seller status.

fields.name: InTradeStatus
fields.description: The in trade status needed to qualify for Top Seller status.

fields.name: PeriodStart
fields.description: The start date of the qualifying period (in UTC). Only applicable to members that are not top sellers.

fields.name: PeriodEnd
fields.description: The end date of the qualifying period (in UTC). Only applicable to members that are not top sellers.
